message: Let's be reasonable, I'm giving you a good deal!
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Come on, let's meet in the middle!
Time is running out, and the deal is getting worse. Let's close this out - this is my final offer.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. Let's try again.
Look, I've been patient, but this is ridiculous. A 50/50 split is the only fair option at this point. Take it or leave it.
